document_data.name: Ministry of Riches
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ministry of Riches''' was found near the stone wharves in [[Dihliz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|19}}
document_data.Activities: The Ministry of Riches was located within the open bazaar in Dihliz where smuggling was prevalent. Their main responsibility was levying a small tax on all reported treasure recovered from local ruins. A 1% tax based on the item's value was imposed on mundane items, and the Ministry always offered to purchase [[magic item]]s at full market value.
document_data.Members: The title of Minister of Riches, and head of the Ministry, belonged to [[Jel al-Galiz]] as of 1367 DR.{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|17}}
